caption.p: Amino acid substitutions in the S protein epitope regions of the field and vaccine strains. The twelve substitutions between the Japanese field strains and vaccine strains were I500T, T504S, H/S525Y/R/L, S566F, K567Â N, D570Y, S579P, K588R, A/E509D, V613D/V, E627D, and L636F. Predicted serine phosphorylation was occurred at positions 521, 553, and 770
